description.value: Alchemists use ankheg bile to create various acidic concoctions. Use: As an action, you can splash the contents of the vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw it up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a target creature, treating the vial as an Improvised Weapon. On a successful hit, the target takes 1d6 acid damage.
